Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAdmin
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAdmin"
FailoverClusterService SOAP Command

Failover Cluster Service

Network edition only API TRUE
Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required true

FailoverClusterServiceRequest

    <FailoverClusterServiceRequest> ## FailoverClusterServiceRequest
        <service name="{cluster-svc-name}" newServer="{new-server}" /> ## FailoverClusterServiceSpec
    </FailoverClusterServiceRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <FailoverClusterServiceRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/service Optional (0 or 1) Failover details
/service@name Required (only 1) Type:String
Cluster service name
/service@newServer Required (only 1) Type:String
New Server

FailoverClusterServiceResponse

    <FailoverClusterServiceResponse /> ## FailoverClusterServiceResponse
